name: Nemo Heliopolis Portable Shower Tent
description: Get changed, shower, and enjoy glamping. The Heliopolis is a private bathroom for the great outdoors. Designed to work with the Nemo’s Helio showers, this tent gives you s private shower stall. It can also cover your camp toilet, and has an internal door lock and a toilet paper holder.75-denier polyester, no-see-um mesh and 1 hubbed aluminum 16mm pole.Pass through holds a Helio shower nozzle for a hands-free showering.French drainage prevents the enclosure from filling up.Over head towel rack.Door lock mechanism secure the zippered door.Glow in the dark logo makes it easy to find at night.Dimensions: floor 1.5 sq. m, peak height 213 cm.Packed dimensions: 69 x 18 x 18 cm.Included: Heliopolis, poles, stakes, guy line, and storage sack.
